channel.title: Good Screen Recorder
channel.description: Does anyone know of a good screen recorder. Im making a youtube channel for games I play for montages and whatnot. I use X-Fire, but it lags for some odd reason, does anyone know of a good, FREE one that doesnt lag and is decent to use. I heard fraps was amazing but its 37$. All ideas appreciated, thanks.

item.title: Good Screen Recorder
item.dc:creator: @Loveandpower Loveandpower
item.description:
@Loveandpower wrote:

If you do not want Fraps I would suggest Camtasia.

Read full topic

item.description:
@Mack_n_cheese wrote:

i got a registered hypercam 2 yesterday and it’s pretty nice, if you would want that :S

Read full topic

item.title: Good Screen Recorder
item.dc:creator: @Acrodox Acrodox
item.description:
@Acrodox wrote:

[quote=“Primadude, post:2, topic:391347”]Fraps, definitely.

Whatever you see, it’ll record that exactly, no playback lag. I can record without any fps difficulty with fraps ;).

Get a cracked version, either by torrent or by another way; fraps is limited in the free online version. I haven’t payed a penny and I’ve got the full version of fraps.[/quote]

Wow didn’t even think of getting a cracked version. Thanks man.

Read full topic

item.title: Good Screen Recorder
item.dc:creator: @primadude Primadude
item.description:
@primadude wrote:

Fraps, definitely.

Whatever you see, it’ll record that exactly, no playback lag. I can record without any fps difficulty with fraps ;).

Get a cracked version, either by torrent or by another way; fraps is limited in the free online version. I haven’t payed a penny and I’ve got the full version of fraps.

Read full topic
